product_name: Pacsafe Metrosafe 100 GII Hip and Shoulder Bag
long_description: The Pacsafe Metrosafe GII is a slash-proof and tamper-resistant shoulder bag-it carries all your daily essentials and must-have electronic gadgets, as well as a small travel book or planner. Make a simple adjustment to the detachable strap to wear it as either a shoulder bag or hip pack. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into areas normally targeted by bag slashers. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire is integrated into the adjustable carry strap to prevent bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Shoulder strap has a releasable security hook at 1 end that allows the strap to be attached to a fixture so no one can walk off with your bag. Zippered main pocket and front compartment. Pacsafe Metrosafe 100 GII sports 2 padded pockets, pen slot, key clip and headphone port.
